relatedBlades.title: Migrate to Cloudflare to boost your availability and performance
relatedBlades.subtitle: Cloudflare offers ultra-fast static and dynamic content delivery over our vast global edge network. Whether you're migrating from StackPath CDN, Lumen or another provider, we're here to support your business needs.
iconCopyList: Deliver fast, rich user experiences by optimizing Internet applications on Cloudflare's global Anycast network across %{DataCenterCount} cities and 100+ countries.
Protect your business against large-scale, sophisticated cyber attacks with Cloudflare's integrated DDoS protection, WAF, Bot Management, API Protection and more.
Lower your TCO with Cloudflare's affordable and consistent pricing while eliminating excessive egress fees by limiting unnecessary cache data evictions.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare recognized as the innovation leader in the Frost Radar Global Content Delivery Network, 2023 by Frost & Sullivan
relatedBlades.copy: Learn what enterprise tech professionals love about Cloudflare's global network.

relatedBlades.title: Protect and accelerate your enterprise websites, apps, and teams.
The Cloudflare global network
relatedBlades.copy:
Our vast global network, which is one of the fastest on the planet, is trusted by millions of web properties. 

With direct connections to nearly every service provider and cloud provider, the Cloudflare network can reach about 95% of the world's population within approximately %{OperationMilliseconds} ms.

[Learn more](https://www.cloudflare.com/network/)

plansList.description: For personal websites, blogs, and anyone who wants to explore Cloudflare.
For professional websites, blogs, and portfolios requiring basic security and performance.
For small eCommerce websites and businesses requiring advanced security and performance, PCI compliance, and prioritized email support.
For companies requiring enterprise-grade security and performance, prioritized 24/7/365 phone, email, or chat support, and guaranteed uptime.

features.title: Analyst report: GigaOM Radar for CDN
features.description: Cloudflare named a Leader and Outperformer in the 2023 GigaOm Radar for CDN. Download this analyst report to gain valuable knowledge on emerging technologies, market leaders, and strategies to optimize your content delivery.

features.title: Frost & Sullivan 2022 Technology Innovation Leader in Global CDN

features.title: Ready for a Fresh Start, Fast?
features.description: With Cloudflare's new Migration-as-a-Service offering, migrate to Cloudflare to supercharge your application and web performance. Read the solution brief to learn more.

features.title: Cloudflare CDN Reference Architecture
features.description: Learn how Cloudflare CDN resolves traditional challenges customers face with web applications. Download the whitepaper to learn more.

features.title: Case Study: Ted Baker
features.description: Global lifestyle brand Ted Baker creates a first-class customer experience with web performance and security solutions from Cloudflare.

features.title: Case study: PhonePe
features.description: Using Cloudflare, PhonePe provides a frictionless and low-latency customer experience to more than 400 million registered users.

features.title: Case Study: Caliente
features.description: Caliente, Mexico's number-one online gaming and live sports betting platform, achieves performance, simplicity, and security with a single vendor solution from Cloudflare.

relatedBlades.quote: "We are caching 80% of our traffic on Cloudflare, and saw page load times for both desktop and mobile clients decrease on average by 50% - which was amazing!"

quoteCarousel.quote: "Our previous provider seems obsolete compared to Cloudflare. Deploying comparable features like Argo Smart Routing and tiered caching was significantly easier to enable, requiring zero changes to our infrastructure."
"With Cloudflare's CDN the load time of our images improved by 2-3x and on top of that we're saving over 50% on our monthly bandwidth usage."

relatedBlades.title: Trusted by millions of Internet properties
